mapper.select: SELECT SUM(settlement_income) as btcYesterday FROM t_income WHERE income_type = 2 AND TO_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE) = TO_DAYS(create_time) AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT SUM(settlement_income) FROM t_income WHERE income_type = 2 AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT SUM(money) as cnyYesterday FROM t_income WHERE income_type = 3 AND TO_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE) = TO_DAYS(create_time) AND user_id = #{userId}

SELECT income_id,user_id,SUM(settlement_income) AS settlement_income,DATE_SUB(create_time,INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS create_time FROM t_income WHERE income_type = 2 AND user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY create_time ORDER BY create_time
SELECT * FROM t_income WHERE income_type = 3 AND user_id = #{userId}

SELECT SUM(o.actual_receipts+o.maturity_income) AS frozen_income FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_financial_product f ON f.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.order_type = 3 AND o.order_status = 2 AND o.user_id = #{userId}
